item.title: Facebook: The new giant of advertising?

item.title: Ensuring facebook canvas applications work in IE8 / IE9 / IE10
item.description: Last week I deployed a new Facebook application into a production environment. Everything seemed to be working perfectly, but then I received a report that the application wasn’t working correctly in IE8+. I narrowed down the problem, and then realised that sessions weren’t working. It turns out IE8+ has a security policy that prevents iframes from setting cookies if the parent domain is different. Therefore because my PHP session cooking wouldn’t set, the sessions obviously didn’t work between pages.
